familytreeproper

Class Person

  • java.lang.Object
    • familytreeproper.Person
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Person
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    title FamilyTree Author Frederick Bertram date 16/05/2018 file name FamilyTreeProper.java Purpose this displays a family tree for a given root person and the relatives and details of each. Assumptions the user is responsible for entering correct data If the user enters a grandchild it won't worry who the parent is of that grandchild seeing it could be either child 1 or 2 i wasn't able to code around this in time. For name and other data the user can enter any value they want if they want to call someone a banana that is ok.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
